attributes.review: I got this app a few months ago and it would crash when I was on the app for a few minutes and sometimes it would just not let me in whatsoever I would delete it and download it hoping it would work but it wouldn’t.
attributes.title: Kept crashing😫

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I would get to understand what’s going on and what Trump’s plans are, but the app kept crashing. I tried clicking on several things and the buttons wouldn’t work. I absolutely HATE this app. It doesn’t work the way it should be working.
attributes.title: Horrible experience

attributes.review: I opened the app hoping to support a random guy and this dusty cheeto looking creature was staring at me and I got scared 😳. so I ran to my dog to show him and he passed out ! then I got a message saying how awful that orange man is ! I am truly disgusted, then my phone started to glitch like crazy and I was being haunted by the scary cheeto 😔. please Do NoT download this app ✨ xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo 🐝
attributes.title: gross !

attributes.review: Everyone listen this app is horrible ! And trump said he will stop production of trucks ?! What are we gonna drive white folks💔 I’m heartbroken. This app also take so long to download. I don’t recommend getting it! It installs a virus to your phone ! This app is the worst app. I love our orange president ❤️ carrots are my fav vegetables they remind me of him
attributes.title: 🧚🏽‍♂️horrible app🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review:
I saw this app and wanted to see what it was all about, but right as I downloaded it I was kidnapped by a bunch of flying monkeys. 
They picked me up in a bag and started chanting something about the wizard of oz, and then they made me wear these weird red shoes. I ended up getting squished by a falling house and it wasn’t an overall good experience.
attributes.title: Flying monkeys am I right

attributes.review: I don’t know who this app was made for but when I downloaded it I thought I was about to see cool stuff but the app started telling me they were going to ruin my life and steal my phone and I ain’t about that. This app threatens this whole country and I think it’s very very dangerous. It shouldn’t even exist.
attributes.title: Sheesh worst app in the world

attributes.review: I was curious to see what this app had to offer, but upon downloading it, my grandmother died, my dog got hit by a car, and my oven burst into flames. I highly suggest no one downloads this app, especially children of God because there must be some type of curse placed on this app. I’m still shaken up, but my dog is fine. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: Worst App I’ve Ever Downloaded

attributes.review: Donald Trump is a sexist, racist, homophobic moron. I move that Donald becomes the male version of a Karen (he’s worse than a Karen though). Also trying to remove TikTok from America is fascist. It has nothing to do with China spying on us. It has to do with the oppression of people rising up and speaking out against him and the injustice in America. A vote for Trump is a vote against women, poc, and the queer community.
attributes.title: The Chubby Cheeto

attributes.review: I would give it zero stars if I could. Laggy, slow, is THIS what our own American president provides us with? I expected something better. I am a proud American citizen and will be reconsidering my vote this November, because if a man can’t even create a proper app than how can he run a country?
attributes.title: Horrible!!!! Don’t waste your time on it!

attributes.review: i wish i could rate this 0 stars!! it look 47 days to download then when i finally opened the app it hacked my phone and sent all my info to the government!! it then somehow sent a text to my mother saying the cat died! she was devastated. not appropriate from the PRESIDENT OF THE USA!! unless u want your info leaked and a mother with ptsd, i don’t recommend!! 🧚🏼‍♀️😌💗✨
attributes.title: AWFUL
